comment.brief: For pages: Use the control/navigation default
comment.full: For pages: Use the control/navigation default

comment.brief: No transition is provided. It is expected that you provide your own transition on the pages.
comment.full: No transition is provided. It is expected that you provide your own transition on the pages.

comment.brief: A default transition suitable for the theme/app is used. Typically this is a sliding.
comment.full: A default transition suitable for the theme/app is used. Typically this is a sliding.

comment.brief:
Specifies what transitions should be used for page navigation. If you wish to create your own
transitions set to `None` and add your own to the pages.
comment.full:
Specifies what transitions should be used for page navigation. If you wish to create your own
transitions set to `None` and add your own to the pages.

When using custom transitions be sure to add a @ReleasePage action. This instructs the `Navigator` on when it can reuse, discard, or add the page to its cache.
